documentation.text:
For a player to challenge a current wager (i.e. enter the bet).
 @param participant - address of the challenger

Allowing winner to withdraw money.
 @dev in order to prevent withdrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

Allow participant to check his own stake
 @return stake of the `msg.sender` in the wager

Allow participant to withdraw money
 @dev Also want to check participant is not withdrawing from a wager that has all stakes withdrawn.

Retrieving number of participants in the game
 @return Number of participants in the game

Determine the winner of the wager
 @return Address of the winner
Advancing the Wager state.

Determine the winner of the Wager
 @return Address of the winner

documentation.text:
For a player to challenge a current wager (i.e. enter the bet).
 @param participant - address of the challenger

Allowing winner to withdraw money.
 @dev in order to prevent withdrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

Allow participant to check his own stake
 @return stake of the `msg.sender` in the wager

Allow participant to withdraw money
 @dev Also want to check participant is not withdrawing from a wager that has all stakes withdrawn.

Retrieving number of participants in the game
 @return Number of participants in the game

Determine the winner of the wager
 @return Address of the winner
Advancing the Wager state.

Determine the winner of the Wager
 @return Address of the winner

params._duration: - The duration of the wager `open` period
params._owner: - the owner to be recognized by this contract. Not necessarily `msg.sender` nor `tx.origin` for flexibility.

returns._0: stake of the `msg.sender` in the wager

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

participantWithdraw().details: Also want to check participant is not withdrawing from a wager that has all stakes withdrawn.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: Number of participants in the game

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

winnerWithdraw().details: in order to prevent withdrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

myStake().notice: Allow participant to check his own stake

participate(address).notice: For a player to challenge a current wager (i.e. enter the bet).

totalParticipants().notice: Retrieving number of participants in the game
